title: Zoom (us.zoom.config)
description: Settings for Zoom Client for Mac.

setusesystemdefaultspeakerforvoip.title: Set use system default speaker for voip
setusesystemdefaultspeakerforvoip.description: Uses the system default speaker when using computer audio (Enabled by default)

ZHideNoVideoUser.title: Hide No Video User
ZHideNoVideoUser.description: Hide non-video participants by default (Disabled by default)

proxy.title: Proxy
proxy.description: Set the proxy server for the Zoom Client

ConfirmWhenLeave.title: Confirm When Leave
ConfirmWhenLeave.description: Confirm before leaving a meeting (Enabled by default)

zdisablesendvideo.title: Disable send video
zdisablesendvideo.description: Disable sending video from the Zoom Client (Disabled by default)

disablecomputeraudio.title: Disable computer audio
disablecomputeraudio.description: Disable use of computer audio on the Zoom Client

proxypac.title: Proxy PAC
proxypac.description: Set proxy server to client with PAC URL for the Zoom Client (Disabled by default)

login_domain.title: Login domain
login_domain.description: Set the email address domain that users can login with (Disabled by default)

ZAutoSSOLogin.title: Auto SSO Login
ZAutoSSOLogin.description: Default to login with SSO (Disabled by default)

disableloginwithemail.title: Disable login with email
disableloginwithemail.description: Disable Email login option (Disabled by default)

zdisablelocalrecord.title: Disable local record
zdisablelocalrecord.description: Disables Local Recording from the Zoom Client (Disabled by default)

enableoriginalsound.title: Enable original sound
enableoriginalsound.description: Enable Orginal Sound for audio (Disabled by default)

EnableIndependentDataPort.title: Enable Independent Data Port
EnableIndependentDataPort.description: Split traffic across different ports for easier identification (Disabled by default), Video share: 8801, Screensharing: 8802, Audio: 8803

ShowConnectedTime.title: Show Connected Time
ShowConnectedTime.description: Show the length of time that the user has been in a meeting (Disabled by default)

forcessourl.title: Force SSO URL
forcessourl.description: Configures and locks the SSO URL (Disabled by default)

AutoHideToolbar.title: Auto Hide Toolbar
AutoHideToolbar.description: Always show meeting controls (Disable auto-hide toolbar)

setusesystemdefaultmicforvoip.title: Set use system default mic for voip
setusesystemdefaultmicforvoip.description: Uses the system default speaker when using microphone audio (Enabled by default)

proxybypass.title: Proxy bypass
proxybypass.description: Set proxy bypass rule for the Zoom Client (Disabled by default)

disableremotecontrol.title: Disable remote control
disableremotecontrol.description: Disables Remote Control when screen sharing (Disabled by default)

disablevirtualbkgnd.title: Disable virtual background
disablevirtualbkgnd.description: Disables use of the Virtual Background feature (Disabled by default)

ZAutoFitWhenViewShare.title: Auto Fit When View Share
ZAutoFitWhenViewShare.description: Automatically fit to window when viewing shared content (Enabled by default)

ZDualMonitorOn.title: Dual Monitor On
ZDualMonitorOn.description: Automatically enable dual monitor (Disabled by default)

DefaultUsePortraitView.title: Default Use Portrait View
DefaultUsePortraitView.description: Default to Portrait Mode upon opening Zoom (Disabled by default)

EnableEchoCancellation.title: Enable Echo Cancellation
EnableEchoCancellation.description: Enables echo cancellation for the microphone audio (Disabled by default)

bandwidthlimitup.title: Bandwidth limit up
bandwidthlimitup.description: Limit the Maximum amount of bandwidth by the Mac client (Disabled by default)

disableremotesupport.title: Disable remote support
disableremotesupport.description: Disables 1:1 remote support when screen sharing (Disabled by default)

ZUse720PByDefault.title: Use 720P By Default
ZUse720PByDefault.description: Enable HD Video by default (Disabled by default)

enablesplitscreen.title: Enable split screen
enablesplitscreen.description: Enables side-by-side mode by default (Disabled by default)

LastLoginType.title: Last Login Type
LastLoginType.description: Remember the last login type used (Disabled by default)

AddFWException.title: Add FW Exception
AddFWException.description: Disable UAC prompt when logging into Zoom

ZRemoteControllAllApp.title: Remote Control All App
ZRemoteControllAllApp.description: Remote control all applications (Enabled by default)

zdisablecmr.title: Disable cmr (Cloud Recording)
zdisablecmr.description: Disables Cloud Recording from the Zoom Client (Disabled by default)

EnableMirrorEffect.title: Enable Mirror Effect
EnableMirrorEffect.description: Enable mirroring of shared video (Disabled by default)

nofacebook.title: No Facebook
nofacebook.description: Disable Facebook login option (Disabled by default)

FullScreenWhenJoin.title: Full Screen When Join
FullScreenWhenJoin.description: Full Screen when starting or joining a meeting (Disabled by default)

zdisablerecvvideo.title: Disable recv video
zdisablerecvvideo.description: Disable receiving video from the Zoom Client (Disabled by default)

EnableSSLVerification.title: Enable SSL Verification
EnableSSLVerification.description: The Zoom Client will verify the server certificate (Disabled by default)

MuteVoipWhenJoin.title: Mute Voip When Join
MuteVoipWhenJoin.description: Always mute microphone when joining a meeting (Disabled by default)

audioautoadjust.title: Audio auto adjust
audioautoadjust.description: Automatically adjust microphone levels (Enabled by default)

keepsignedin.title: Keep signed in
keepsignedin.description: Client automatically logs in to the last account used (Disabled by default)

nogoogle.title: No Google
nogoogle.description: Disable Google login option (Disabled by default)

ZDisableVideo.title: Disable video
ZDisableVideo.description: Disable Camera by default (Disabled by default)

bandwidthlimitdown.title: Bandwidth limit down
bandwidthlimitdown.description: Limit the Minimum amount of bandwidth used by the Mac client (Disabled by default)

DisableScreenShare.title: Disable Screen Share
DisableScreenShare.description: Disable Screen Share when starting or joining a meeting (Disabled by default)

recordpath.title: Record path
recordpath.description: Set path for local meeting recording files (~/Documents/Zoom by default)

ZAutoFullScreenWhenViewShare.title: Auto Full Screen When View Share
ZAutoFullScreenWhenViewShare.description: Automatically enter full screen when viewing shared content (Enabled by default)

ZAutoUpdate.title: Auto Update
ZAutoUpdate.description: Allow updates through the client (Disabled by default)
